61  public function getForm($identifier, $instance) {
62  $form = $this->jquery->semantic ()->dataForm ( $identifier, $instance );
63  $form->setLibraryId ( "frmEdit" );
64  $className = \get_class ( $instance );
65  $fields = $this->controller->_getAdminData ()->getFormFieldNames ( $className, $instance );
66  $relFields = OrmUtils::getFieldsInRelations_ ( $className );
67 
68  $this->setFormFields_ ( $fields, $relFields );
69  array_unshift ( $fields, "_message" );
70  $form->setFields ( $fields );
71 
72  $fieldTypes = OrmUtils::getFieldTypes ( $className );
73  $this->setFormFieldsComponent ( $form, $fieldTypes );
74  $this->relationMembersInForm ( $form, $instance, $className, $fields, $relFields );
75  OrmUtils::setFieldToMemberNames ( $fields, $relFields );
76  $form->setCaptions ( $this->getFormCaptions ( $fields, $className, $instance ) );
77  $message = $this->getFormTitle ( $form, $instance );
78  $form->setCaption ( "_message", $message ["subMessage"] );
79  $form->fieldAsMessage ( "_message", [ "icon" => $message ["icon"] ] );
80  $instance->_message = $message ["message"];
81  $form->setSubmitParams ( $this->controller->_getBaseRoute () . "/update", "#frm-add-update" );
82  $form->onGenerateField ( [ $this,'onGenerateFormField' ] );
83  return $form;
84  }
85 
96  public function getMemberForm($identifier, $instance, $member, $td, $part) {
97  $editMemberParams = $this->getEditMemberParams_ ( $part );
98 
99  $form = $this->jquery->semantic ()->dataForm ( $identifier, $instance );
100  $form->on ( "dblclick", "", true, true );
101  $form->setProperty ( "onsubmit", "return false;" );
102  $form->addClass ( "_memberForm" );
103  $className = \get_class ( $instance );
104  $fields = [ "id",$member ];
105  $relFields = OrmUtils::getFieldsInRelations_ ( $className );
106  $hasRelations = $this->setFormFields_ ( $fields, $relFields );
107  $form->setFields ( $fields );
108  $fieldTypes = OrmUtils::getFieldTypes ( $className );
109  $form->fieldAsHidden ( 0 );
110  $this->setMemberFormFieldsComponent ( $form, $fieldTypes );
111  if ($hasRelations) {
112  $this->relationMembersInForm ( $form, $instance, $className, $fields, $relFields );
113  }
114  $form->setCaptions ( [ "","" ] );
115  $form->onGenerateField ( function (HtmlFormField $f, $nb) use ($identifier, $editMemberParams) {
116  if ($nb == 1) {
117  $f->setSize ( "mini" );
118  if ($editMemberParams->getHasButtons ()) {
119  $btO = HtmlButton::icon ( "btO", "check" )->addClass ( "green mini compact" )->onClick ( "\$('#" . $identifier . "').trigger('validate');", true, true );
120  $btC = HtmlButton::icon ( "btC", "close" )->addClass ( "mini compact" )->onClick ( "\$('#" . $identifier . "').trigger('endEdit');" );
121  $f->wrap ( "<div class='fields' style='margin:0;'>", [ $btO,$btC,"</div>" ] );
122  if (! $editMemberParams->getHasPopup ()) {
123  $f->setWidth ( 16 )->setProperty ( "style", "padding-left:0;" );
124  }
125  }
126  $f->on ( "keydown", "if(event.which == 13) {\$('#" . $identifier . "').trigger('validate');}if(event.keyCode===27) {\$('#" . $identifier . "').trigger('endEdit');}" );
127  $f->onClick ( "return false;", true, true );
128  } else {
129  $f->setProperty ( "style", "display: none;" );
130  }
131  } );
132  $form->setSubmitParams ( $this->controller->_getBaseRoute () . "/updateMember/" . $member . "/" . $editMemberParams->getUpdateCallback (), "#" . $td, [ "attr" => "","hasLoader" => false,"jsCallback" => "$(self).remove();","jqueryDone" => "html" ] );
133  if ($editMemberParams->getHasPopup ()) {
134  $endEdit = "\$('#" . $identifier . "').html();\$('.popup').hide();\$('#" . $td . "').popup('destroy');";
135  $validate = $endEdit;
136  } else {
137  $endEdit = "let td=\$('#" . $td . "');td.html(td.data('originalText'));";
138  $validate = "";
139  }
140  $form->on ( "endEdit", $endEdit );
141  $form->on ( "validate", "\$('#" . $identifier . "').form('submit');" . $validate );
142  $this->jquery->execAtLast ( "$('form').find('input[type=text],textarea,select').filter(':visible:first').focus();" );
143  return $form;
144  }
145 
146  private function setFormFields_(&$fields, $relFields) {
147  $hasRelations = false;
148  $relFields = array_flip ( $relFields );
149  foreach ( $fields as $index => $field ) {
150  if (isset ( $relFields [$field] )) {
151  $fields [$index] = $relFields [$field];
152  $hasRelations = true;
153  }
154  }
155  return $hasRelations;
156  }
157 
165  protected function getFormTitle($form, $instance) {
166  $type = ($instance->_new) ? "new" : "edit";
167  $messageInfos = [ "new" => [ "icon" => HtmlIconGroups::corner ( "table", "plus", "big" ),"subMessage" => "New object creation" ],"edit" => [ "icon" => HtmlIconGroups::corner ( "table", "edit", "big" ),"subMessage" => "Editing an existing object" ] ];
168  $message = $messageInfos [$type];
169  $message ["message"] = \get_class ( $instance );
170  return $message;
171  }

180  public function setFormFieldsComponent(DataForm $form, $fieldTypes) {
181  $this->setFormFieldsComponent_ ( $form, $fieldTypes );
182  }
183 
191  public function setMemberFormFieldsComponent(DataForm $form, $fieldTypes) {
192  $this->setFormFieldsComponent_ ( $form, $fieldTypes );
193  }
194 
195  private function setFormFieldsComponent_(DataForm $form, $fieldTypes) {
196  foreach ( $fieldTypes as $property => $type ) {
197  switch ($property) {
198  case "password" :
199  $form->fieldAsInput ( $property, [ "inputType" => "password" ] );
200  $form->setValidationParams ( [ "inline" => true ] );
201  break;
202  case "email" :
203  case "mail" :
204  $form->fieldAsInput ( $property, [ "inputType" => "email","rules" => [ [ "email" ] ] ] );
205  break;
206  }
207 
208  switch ($type) {
209  case "tinyint(1)" :
210  $form->fieldAsCheckbox ( $property );
211  break;
212  case "int" :
213  case "integer" :
214  $form->fieldAsInput ( $property, [ "inputType" => "number" ] );
215  break;
216  case "date" :
217  $form->fieldAsInput ( $property, [ "inputType" => "date" ] );
218  break;
219  case "datetime" :
220  $form->fieldAsInput ( $property, [ "inputType" => "datetime-local" ] );
221  break;
222  }
223  }
224  }
225 
237  public function getModelDataElement($instance, $model, $modal) {
238  $semantic = $this->jquery->semantic ();
239  $fields = $this->controller->_getAdminData ()->getElementFieldNames ( $model );
240 
241  $dataElement = $semantic->dataElement ( "de", $instance );
242  $pk = OrmUtils::getFirstKeyValue ( $instance );
243  $dataElement->getInstanceViewer ()->setIdentifierFunction ( function () use ($pk) {
244  return $pk;
245  } );
246  $dataElement->setFields ( $fields );
247  $dataElement->setCaptions ( $this->getElementCaptions ( $fields, $model, $instance ) );
248 
249  $fkInstances = CRUDHelper::getFKIntances ( $instance, $model );
250  foreach ( $fkInstances as $member => $fkInstanceArray ) {
251  if (array_search ( $member, $fields ) !== false) {
252  $dataElement->setValueFunction ( $member, function () use ($fkInstanceArray, $member) {
253  return $this->getFkMemberElement ( $member, $fkInstanceArray ["objectFK"], $fkInstanceArray ["fkClass"], $fkInstanceArray ["fkTable"] );
254  } );
255  }
256  }
257  $this->addEditMemberFonctionality ( "dataElement" );
258  return $dataElement;
259  }

281  public function getModelDataTable($instances, $model, $totalCount, $page = 1) {
282  $adminRoute = $this->controller->_getBaseRoute ();
283  $files = $this->controller->_getFiles ();
284  $dataTable = $this->getDataTableInstance ( $instances, $model, $totalCount, $page );
285  $attributes = $this->controller->_getAdminData ()->getFieldNames ( $model );
286  $this->setDataTableAttributes ( $dataTable, $attributes, $model, $instances );
287  $dataTable->setCaptions ( $this->getCaptions ( $attributes, $model ) );
288 
289  $dataTable->addClass ( "small very compact" );
290  $lbl = new HtmlLabel ( "search-query", "<span id='search-query-content'></span>" );
291  $icon = $lbl->addIcon ( "delete", false );
292  $lbl->wrap ( "<span>", "</span>" );
293  $lbl->setProperty ( "style", "display: none;" );
294  $icon->getOnClick ( $adminRoute . $files->getRouteRefreshTable (), "#lv", [ "jqueryDone" => "replaceWith","hasLoader" => "internal" ] );
295 
296  $dataTable->addItemInToolbar ( $lbl );
297  $dataTable->addSearchInToolbar ();
298  $dataTable->setToolbarPosition ( PositionInTable::FOOTER );
299  $dataTable->getToolbar ()->setSecondary ();
300  return $dataTable;
301  }

303  public function setDataTableAttributes(DataTable $dataTable, $attributes, $model, $instances, $selector = null) {
304  $modal = ($this->isModal ( $instances, $model ) ? "modal" : "no");
305 
306  $adminRoute = $this->controller->_getBaseRoute ();
307  $files = $this->controller->_getFiles ();
308  $dataTable->setButtons ( $this->getDataTableRowButtons () );
309  $dataTable->setFields ( $attributes );
310  if (array_search ( "password", $attributes ) !== false) {
311  $dataTable->setValueFunction ( "password", function ($v) {
312  return UString::mask ( $v );
313  } );
314  }
315  $dataTable->setIdentifierFunction ( CRUDHelper::getIdentifierFunction ( $model ) );
316 
317  if (! isset ( $selector )) {
318  if ($this->showDetailsOnDataTableClick ()) {
319  $dataTable->getOnRow ( "click", $adminRoute . $files->getRouteDetails (), "#table-details", [ "selector" => $selector,"attr" => "data-ajax","hasLoader" => false,"jsCondition" => "!event.detail || event.detail==1","jsCallback" => "return false;" ] );
320  $dataTable->setActiveRowSelector ( "active" );
321  }
322 
323  $dataTable->setUrls ( [ "refresh" => $adminRoute . $files->getRouteRefresh (),"delete" => $adminRoute . $files->getRouteDelete (),"edit" => $adminRoute . $files->getRouteEdit () . "/" . $modal,"display" => $adminRoute . $files->getRouteDisplay () . "/" . $modal ] );
324  $dataTable->setTargetSelector ( [ "delete" => "#table-messages","edit" => "#frm-add-update","display" => "#table-details" ] );
325  $this->addEditMemberFonctionality ( "dataTable" );
326  }
327  $this->addAllButtons ( $dataTable, $attributes );
328  }
329 
330  public function addEditMemberFonctionality($part) {
331  if (($editMemberParams = $this->getEditMemberParams ()) !== false) {
332  if (isset ( $editMemberParams [$part] )) {
333  $params = $editMemberParams [$part];
334  $params->compile ( $this->controller->_getBaseRoute (), $this->jquery, $part );
335  }
336  }
337  }

347  public function recordsPerPage($model, $totalCount = 0) {
348  if ($totalCount > 6)
349  return 6;
350  return;
351  }

356  public function getGroupByFields() {
357  return;
358  }
359 
365  public function onGenerateFormField($field,$nb) {
366  if($field instanceof HtmlFormInput){
367  if($field->getDataField()->getProperty('type')=="datetime-local"){
368  $v=$field->getDataField()->getProperty('value');
369  $field->getDataField()->setValue(date("Y-m-d\TH:i:s", strtotime($v)));
370  }
371  }
372  return;
373  }
374 
384  protected function getDataTableInstance($instances, $model, $totalCount, $page = 1): DataTable {
385  $semantic = $this->jquery->semantic ();
386  $recordsPerPage = $this->recordsPerPage ( $model, $totalCount );
387  if (is_numeric ( $recordsPerPage )) {
388  $grpByFields = $this->getGroupByFields ();
389  if (is_array ( $grpByFields )) {
390  $dataTable = $semantic->dataTable ( "lv", $model, $instances );
391  $dataTable->setGroupByFields ( $grpByFields );
392  } else {
393  $dataTable = $semantic->jsonDataTable ( "lv", $model, $instances );
394  }
395  $dataTable->paginate ( $page, $totalCount, $recordsPerPage, 5 );
396  $dataTable->onActiveRowChange ( '$("#table-details").html("");' );
397  $dataTable->onSearchTerminate ( '$("#search-query-content").html(data);$("#search-query").show();$("#table-details").html("");' );
398  } else {
399  $dataTable = $semantic->dataTable ( "lv", $model, $instances );
400  }
401  return $dataTable;
402  }
403 
409  protected function getDataTableRowButtons() {
410  return [ "edit","delete" ];
411  }

413  public function addAllButtons(DataTable $dataTable, $attributes) {
414  $dataTable->onPreCompile ( function () use (&$dataTable) {
415  $dataTable->getHtmlComponent ()->colRightFromRight ( 0 );
416  } );
417  $dataTable->addAllButtons ( false, [ "ajaxTransition" => "random" ], function ($bt) {
418  $bt->addClass ( "circular" );
419  $this->onDataTableRowButton ( $bt );
420  }, function ($bt) {
421  $bt->addClass ( "circular" );
422  $this->onDataTableRowButton ( $bt );
423  }, function ($bt) {
424  $bt->addClass ( "circular" );
425  $this->onDataTableRowButton ( $bt );
426  } );
427  $dataTable->setDisplayBehavior ( [ "jsCallback" => '$("#dataTable").hide();',"ajaxTransition" => "random" ] );
428  }

540  public function getFkMemberElementDetails($memberFK, $objectFK, $fkClass, $fkTable) {
541  $_fkClass = str_replace ( "\\", ".", $fkClass );
542  $header = new HtmlHeader ( "", 4, $memberFK, "content" );
543  if (is_array ( $objectFK ) || $objectFK instanceof \Traversable) {
544  $header = $this->getFkHeaderListDetails ( $memberFK, $fkClass, $objectFK );
545  $element = $this->getFkListDetails ( $memberFK, $fkClass, $objectFK );
546  foreach ( $objectFK as $oItem ) {
547  if (method_exists ( $oItem, "__toString" )) {
548  $id = (CRUDHelper::getIdentifierFunction ( $fkClass )) ( 0, $oItem );
549  $item = $element->addItem ( $oItem . "" );
550  $item->setProperty ( "data-ajax", $_fkClass . "||" . $id );
551  $item->addClass ( "showTable" );
552  $this->onDisplayFkElementListDetails ( $item, $memberFK, $fkClass, $oItem );
553  }
554  }
555  } else {
556  if (method_exists ( $objectFK, "__toString" )) {
557  $header = $this->getFkHeaderElementDetails ( $memberFK, $fkClass, $objectFK );
558  $id = (CRUDHelper::getIdentifierFunction ( $fkClass )) ( 0, $objectFK );
559  $element = $this->getFkElementDetails ( $memberFK, $fkClass, $objectFK );
560  $element->setProperty ( "data-ajax", $_fkClass . "||" . $id )->addClass ( "showTable" );
561  }
562  }
563  if (isset ( $element )) {
564  return [ $header,$element ];
565  }
566  return null;
567  }
568 
577  public function onDisplayFkElementListDetails($element, $member, $className, $object) {
578  }

589  public function getFkMemberElement($memberFK, $objectFK, $fkClass, $fkTable) {
590  $element = "";
591  $_fkClass = str_replace ( "\\", ".", $fkClass );
592  if (is_array ( $objectFK ) || $objectFK instanceof \Traversable) {
593  $element = $this->getFkList ( $memberFK, $objectFK );
594  foreach ( $objectFK as $oItem ) {
595  if (method_exists ( $oItem, "__toString" )) {
596  $id = (CRUDHelper::getIdentifierFunction ( $fkClass )) ( 0, $oItem );
597  $item = $element->addItem ( $oItem . "" );
598  $item->setProperty ( "data-ajax", $_fkClass . "||" . $id );
599  $item->addClass ( "showTable" );
600  $this->displayFkElementList ( $item, $memberFK, $fkClass, $oItem );
601  }
602  }
603  } else {
604  if (method_exists ( $objectFK, "__toString" )) {
605  $id = (CRUDHelper::getIdentifierFunction ( $fkClass )) ( 0, $objectFK );
606  $element = $this->getFkElement ( $memberFK, $fkClass, $objectFK );
607  $element->setProperty ( "data-ajax", $_fkClass . "||" . $id )->addClass ( "showTable" );
608  }
609  }
610  return $element;
611  }

655  public function showDetailsOnDataTableClick() {

658 
659  protected function relationMembersInForm($form, $instance, $className, $fields, $relations) {
660  foreach ( $relations as $field => $member ) {
661  if (array_search ( $field, $fields ) !== false) {
662  if (OrmUtils::getAnnotationInfoMember ( $className, "#manyToOne", $member ) !== false) {
663  $this->manyToOneFormField ( $form, $member, $className, $instance );
664  } elseif (($annot = OrmUtils::getAnnotationInfoMember ( $className, "#oneToMany", $member )) !== false) {
665  $this->oneToManyFormField ( $form, $member, $instance, $annot );
666  } elseif (($annot = OrmUtils::getAnnotationInfoMember ( $className, "#manyToMany", $member )) !== false) {
667  $this->manyToManyFormField ( $form, $member, $instance, $annot );
668  }
669  }
670  }
671  }
672 
673  protected function manyToOneFormField(DataForm $form, $member, $className, $instance) {
674  $joinColumn = OrmUtils::getAnnotationInfoMember ( $className, "#joinColumn", $member );
675  if ($joinColumn) {
676  $fkObject = Reflexion::getMemberValue ( $instance, $member );
677  $fkClass = $joinColumn ["className"];
678  if ($fkObject === null) {
679  $fkObject = new $fkClass ();
680  }
681  $fkId = OrmUtils::getFirstKey ( $fkClass );
682  $fkIdGetter = "get" . \ucfirst ( $fkId );
683  if (\method_exists ( $fkObject, "__toString" ) && \method_exists ( $fkObject, $fkIdGetter )) {
684  $fkField = $joinColumn ["name"];
685  $fkValue = OrmUtils::getFirstKeyValue ( $fkObject );
686  if (! Reflexion::setMemberValue ( $instance, $fkField, $fkValue )) {
687  $instance->{$fkField} = OrmUtils::getFirstKeyValue ( $fkObject );
688  }
689  $form->fieldAsDropDown ( $fkField, JArray::modelArray ( $this->controller->_getAdminData ()->getManyToOneDatas ( $fkClass, $instance, $member ), $fkIdGetter, "__toString" ) );
690  $form->setCaption ( $fkField, \ucfirst ( $member ) );
691  }
692  }
693  }
694 
695  protected function oneToManyFormField(DataForm $form, $member, $instance, $annot) {
696  $newField = $member . "Ids";
697  $fkClass = $annot ["className"];
698  $fkId = OrmUtils::getFirstKey ( $fkClass );
699  $fkIdGetter = "get" . \ucfirst ( $fkId );
700  $fkInstances = DAO::getOneToMany ( $instance, $member );
701  $ids = \array_map ( function ($elm) use ($fkIdGetter) {
702  return $elm->{$fkIdGetter} ();
703  }, $fkInstances );
704  $instance->{$newField} = \implode ( ",", $ids );
705  $form->fieldAsDropDown ( $newField, JArray::modelArray ( $this->controller->_getAdminData ()->getOneToManyDatas ( $fkClass, $instance, $member ), $fkIdGetter, "__toString" ), true );
706  $form->setCaption ( $newField, \ucfirst ( $member ) );
707  }
708 
709  protected function manyToManyFormField(DataForm $form, $member, $instance, $annot) {
710  $newField = $member . "Ids";
711  $fkClass = $annot ["targetEntity"];
712  $fkId = OrmUtils::getFirstKey ( $fkClass );
713  $fkIdGetter = "get" . \ucfirst ( $fkId );
714  $fkInstances = DAO::getManyToMany ( $instance, $member );
715  $ids = \array_map ( function ($elm) use ($fkIdGetter) {
716  return $elm->{$fkIdGetter} ();
717  }, $fkInstances );
718  $instance->{$newField} = \implode ( ",", $ids );
719  $form->fieldAsDropDown ( $newField, JArray::modelArray ( $this->controller->_getAdminData ()->getManyToManyDatas ( $fkClass, $instance, $member ), $fkIdGetter, "__toString" ), true, [ "jsCallback" => function ($elm) {
720  $elm->getField ()->asSearch ();
721  } ] );
722  $form->setCaption ( $newField, \ucfirst ( $member ) );
723  }
724 
729  public function getEditMemberParams() {
730  return $this->defaultEditMemberParams ();
731  }
732 
738  protected function getEditMemberParams_($part) {
739  $params = $this->getEditMemberParams ();
740  if ($params && isset ( $params [$part] )) {
741  return $params [$part];
742  }
743  return new EditMemberParams ();
744  }
745 
750  protected function defaultEditMemberParams() {
751  return [ "dataTable" => EditMemberParams::dataTable (),"dataElement" => EditMemberParams::dataElement () ];
752  }
753 }
